page.title: 21Updated
page.content:
Entertainment in dunfermline has changed beyond all recognition.

The Orient Express Cinema referred to is now derelict havin, for a time, been a sports bar. A new Leisure park on the edge of town at halbeath includes Odeon Multi screen, gym, Bingo Hall, Ten pin bowling, crazy golf and lots of eating establishments.

The Bingo Hall referred to (The Alhambra) closed but has now been restored as full refurbished theatre - one of the largest such venues in Scotland hosting everything from comedians, rock bands to Fiddle Orchestras and is a very successful venue. Back to it's original glory.

Carnegie Hall is still open and is also hosts to concerts, plays and shows of all kind. Things have definitely improved 25 years on!
Contribution by: JoeP
